Questions.Question: Who is the author of the 'Harry Potter' book series?
Questions.Explanation: J.K. Rowling is the British author who created the magical world of Harry Potter.

Questions.Question: Which superhero is known as the 'Man of Steel'?
Questions.Explanation: Superman, also known as Clark Kent, is a DC Comics superhero with superhuman abilities.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the fictional city in 'The Simpsons'?
Questions.Explanation: Springfield is the name of the town where the Simpson family resides in the long-running animated series.

Questions.Question: Who is the main character in the 'Twilight' book series?
Questions.Explanation: Bella Swan is the protagonist of the 'Twilight' series, a human caught in a love triangle with vampires.

Questions.Question: Which band released the album 'Abbey Road'?
Questions.Explanation: 'Abbey Road' is the eleventh studio album by The Beatles, released in 1969.

Questions.Question: Who is the lead singer of the band 'Queen'?
Questions.Explanation: Freddie Mercury was the charismatic frontman of the British rock band 'Queen'.

Questions.Question: Which actor played the character Tony Stark in the 'Iron Man' movies?
Questions.Explanation: Robert Downey Jr. portrayed the billionaire genius Tony Stark in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the fictional school in the 'Harry Potter' series?
Questions.Explanation: Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry is the magical school attended by Harry Potter and his friends.

Questions.Question: Which character is known for saying 'I'll be back' in the movie 'The Terminator'?
Questions.Explanation: The Terminator, portrayed by Arnold Schwarzenegger, utters the famous line 'I'll be back' in the film.

Questions.Question: Who is the main character in the 'Star Wars' film series?
Questions.Explanation: Luke Skywalker is the central figure in the 'Star Wars' saga, a Jedi Knight fighting against the dark side.

Questions.Question: Which character is known for wearing a red and blue suit in the 'Spider-Man' comics?
Questions.Explanation: Spider-Man, also known as Peter Parker, dons a red and blue suit while fighting crime.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the fictional town in the TV show 'Stranger Things'?
Questions.Explanation: Hawkins is the town where the supernatural events of 'Stranger Things' take place.

Questions.Question: Which character is known for saying 'May the Force be with you' in 'Star Wars'?
Questions.Explanation: Obi-Wan Kenobi, played by Alec Guinness, imparts the famous phrase in the original 'Star Wars' film.

Questions.Question: Who is the main character in the 'Hunger Games' book series?
Questions.Explanation: Katniss Everdeen is the courageous protagonist of 'The Hunger Games', fighting against a dystopian regime.

Questions.Question: Which character is known for wearing a red cape and blue tights in DC Comics?
Questions.Explanation: Superman, also known as the Man of Steel, sports a red cape and blue tights as his iconic costume.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the fictional planet in the 'Star Trek' series?
Questions.Explanation: Vulcan is the homeworld of the logical and pointy-eared Vulcan species in the 'Star Trek' universe.

Questions.Question: Who is the main character in the 'Game of Thrones' book series?
Questions.Explanation: Jon Snow, portrayed by Kit Harington, is a central figure in the 'Game of Thrones' epic fantasy series.

Questions.Question: Which character is known for wielding a lightsaber in 'Star Wars'?
Questions.Explanation: Luke Skywalker, following in his father's footsteps, becomes a Jedi Knight and wields a lightsaber.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the fictional city in the 'Batman' comics?
Questions.Explanation: Gotham City is the dark and crime-ridden metropolis where Batman fights against villains like the Joker.

Questions.Question: Who is the main character in the 'Sherlock Holmes' detective stories?
Questions.Explanation: Sherlock Holmes is the brilliant and eccentric detective created by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle.

Questions.Question: Which character is known for saying 'I am Iron Man' in the Marvel Cinematic Universe?
Questions.Explanation: Tony Stark, portrayed by Robert Downey Jr., declares 'I am Iron Man' in the first 'Iron Man' film.
